website_summaries.verdict: We love the elegance of this chandelier, especially the many choices in terms of look and size.
pros: Select from a variety of looks (for example black and gold, graphite, and bronze), sizes, and mounts
The look of this option gets high praise from buyers
Generates lots of soft, bright light
cons: Generic instructions leave a lot to be desired
Some reports of this chandelier showing up with cracks, broken, or missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Updated and bright
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this light. It puts out a lot of light but softened light so it's not harsh. Really updated and brightened up our space above the breakfast table!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this light! It gives off lots of soft bright light in our dining room. Easy to install and no parts were damaged. We have 9' ceilings and hung it about 36" above our dining table. The shade is a true pure white even with the light turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Light fixture! Looks so much nicer in person. Delivered the next day with regular shipping. Thanks so much Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Large geometric dining room light
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty big! For my rather small table, anyway. I like the geometric interest this light provides. The underside is frosted glass - for this pricepoint that was a nice surprise. I kind of wish the fabric touched the metal on the sides, but on the plus side it does create interesting shadows when the light is turned off. I have three very bright led bulbs on an led dimmer switch. The bulbs are a standard sized base.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our kitchen remodel, there were no surprises during installation. The fit and finish was very nice and exactly as pictured. Both survived shipped without any damage to include the glass disk diffuser that installs on the bottom. I used 3, 100 watt equivalent LED bulbs and the output is really nice and not overpowering at all, the shade and glass diffuser do an impressive job of controlling the light. Only debate now wether to use a warmer or cooler bulb.
customer_reviews.author: R. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to my dining room.
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful addition to my dining room. I have 2 over my dining room table and they really pull everything together. The quality is great and the size is substantial without being overpowering. No problems with installation.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: We turned this pendant light into a swag lamp for our living, room which was really easy with a lamp cord and it looks beautiful! The only advice I would give, if you are using it for ambient lighting, that even 1 Light bulb at 60w (led equivalent) t was suoer bright. So if you're using it for an entry it will blow your socks off!
customer_reviews.author: SewMarci

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Fixture at an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this chandelier! We installed it above our great room dining table - square table seats 8 people. Very unique and I've seen it for more than twice the Amazon price from other retailers. I love that it has a diffuser on the bottom so you don't have to look at lightbulbs and the contrast between the linen drum shade, dark metal cage, and frosted glass diffuser makes for a great look that fits well in a transitional decorating scheme. I have gotten so many compliments on this chandelier and the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in 2017, update in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, modern and "custom appearance" shade and light fixture...absolutely stunning! Update: In 2017, I purchased three Monica Drum light fixtures. I love them and continue to receive compliments on them. However, last week the large drum glass diffuser over the dining room table spontaneously shattered at 0200 hours-not something you want hear at that time. My maintenance person believes there was a hairline crack, expanded and then shattered. Currently, I am looking for a shatterproof diffuser replacement.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Odd Finish - Not Exactly Oil Rubbed Bronze
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty chandelier. Photo shows it hanging over a 38” x 60” table with the lights on (three 100w bulbs). I wouldn’t call the finish oil rubbed bronze. It’s more of a dark chocolate brown with a copper colored glitter/sparkle. You don’t really notice the “sparkle” unless you’re right up on it and the light catches it. We previously had a five bulb open chandelier, so this one definitely puts out less light...will take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Looks larger than I expected which for my purposes is good. It really stands out. Installation was typical of any other hanging ceiling light. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great light for dining room
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp. Gives off alot of light. The dimmer didn't work on mine, but I think it's my old dimmer switch, which I will be changing out. LED bulbs work great in this lamp, and the styling is modern and rustic. If you like the style then buy it!!🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 After installing the new dimmer, it worked perfectly. Love my new light!
customer_reviews.author: Sampson Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous light I have the 2 light semi flush in my hallway and the 3 light chandelier in my dining room . I also have the 14" pendant in my entry way - great price, fast delivery .
customer_reviews.author: dn2525

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixture.
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Looks great in our dining room. Install instructions left a little to be desired as they are generic for all products this company offers. It was pretty basic and only took a little adjusting to get the job Done.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light fixture! I've drooled over similar fixtures that cost three or four times as much, and this is an excellent substitute. It's simply elegant but still has personality. I've been very pleased, and received a lot of compliments. The glass diffuser on the bottom is a nice touch. It's hanging over our dining table and it's nice that the bulbs aren't exposed beneath.
customer_reviews.author: Katy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great chandelier
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. Looks great and provides great lighting in my kitchen over the table.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this light
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light!! Perfect over our kitchen table. Like several of the other reviews I read, the light did arrive broken (metal bars at the top) but we were able to bend back in place. Great light for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Harwood Graham

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but glass shattered
customer_reviews.text: awesome light , looks good .. but today the glass on the bottom shattered out of no where
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love this light fixture
customer_reviews.text: We removed our heavy old world light fixture and replaced with this light instead. It updated the room instantly. I love this light fixture. We have vaulted ceilings in our house and with our high table it was exactly the right length to hang in our kitchen without having to adjust it. It is a larger size and looks just right in the space.
customer_reviews.author: Jverc

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp, it's perfect for our dining area. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is for the directions to install, definitely set aside some time.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Pence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for something different than the usual 4-6 light chandeliers for over my kitchen table. It dresses up the room without being too formal. Even though it is a drum style, the white shade and delicate curves of the metal gives it a light and airy feel.
customer_reviews.author: AdamsFamily

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive
customer_reviews.text: The fixture is really a great size. Looks more expensive than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trese123

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice
customer_reviews.text: Husband just installed this over our kitchen table. Looks great, looks WAY more expensive than it was, nice construction, attractive finish and shade. Size is good also, large enough to make a statement, not too big over a 6 person table. The glass diffuser on the bottom is a wonderful touch, hate looking into bare bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: fizzyone

customer_reviews.title: Love It and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works great and we get compliments on it. It was very well packaged and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and looks so nice in my dining room. Love it and the price.
customer_reviews.author: crowny

customer_reviews.title: After the two from Amazon were broken I thought I would try another vendor as I did love this light and there were such great re
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light twice from Amazon and then once from Wayfair. All three of them came broken. After the two from Amazon were broken I thought I would try another vendor as I did love this light and there were such great reviews, but the third one from Wayfair was the worst. The iron arms on the top that connect to the center were broken off each time. Too bad because it does look like a nice light.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stobe

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It is elegant and sophisticated. It definitely looks more expensive than it is. The company I purchased this from is fantastic to work with. I had an issue with the glass (was my fault) and they went over and above to help me with it. Rarely do you find companies anymore with such great customer service. Thank you again!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn4ne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so beautiful and classic in bedroom; the screen over the bulb is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JSF

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: What a fixture! Cheaper than most other mfgs. but very quality. I get compliments on a regular basis. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I had thought, but it turned out just fine. I love the way this looks in my formal dining room! Installation wasn't too bad neither.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fixture, but super bummed that the shade has started to separate and fall apart :(
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like the design and construction, the lighting it provides to our dining area, and have no defect ot deficencies to report.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It great. Just what I wanted over my dining room table. Could have used a few more instructions on how to get the base in but we made it work. Love it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and quality
customer_reviews.text: This light I everything I hoped. It's great quality and can use up to 100watts per bulb! It's nice and simple and great for transitional decor when you aren't ready for full on modern.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this light for a bedroom but I liked the look so much I bought another one for my home office!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Dettling

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Canarm Minica 3-light chandelier and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Canarm Minica 3-light chandelier and absolutely love it!! Unfortunately the down rod is bent and it doesn't hang straight. Any suggestions. We are afraid to try to straighten it bcs it could mar it or make it worse. But Its a really nice chandelier, impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine G.

customer_reviews.title: Contemporarily traditional!
customer_reviews.text: In our traditional home this chandelier brings a current and updated look. I was afraid it would be too contemporary but it blends beautifully. The price was spectacular (just under $150).
customer_reviews.author: K. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Beautiful lamp. They forgot to include the glass bottom but sent as soon as I contacted them.
customer_reviews.author: LDB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light Fixture!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light fixture! No problems with parts or shipping. Will recommend for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Tina Galvan

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I expected and was able to install with ease!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice... But missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Bottom glass missing when shipped... Other than that beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I put it in my office and get so many compliments on it. My husband installed it with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender444

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great modern light with a rustic touch. Love this light. Adds so much to a room.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schiltz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love. This is beautiful. Using in my kitchen over a round pedestal table.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Overman

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: A little bulkier than I expected, but I really like this fixture. Have gotten many compliments already.
customer_reviews.author: Rwc

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Great light! Super easy to install. I’m happy with the look and the light from the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Wankerdog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This light is very elegant and it is well made, especially for the price. We shortened up the chain to about nine inches and hung it in the living room. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely light! Hung in home office and it looks great! Looks very quality and was easy to install. An excellent price for a fixture that looks much more expensive! Color is a dark bronze and the shade is white. Glass diffuser is very nice and the 3 lights are perfect for office lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Usma Cadet/Family

customer_reviews.title: Fragile until installed
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned it either was broken (1 place) or broke in more places just moving it to jobsite. It is beautiful and Amazon did replace it quickly when I returned the first one. Second one seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mixture of contemporary and traditional design
customer_reviews.text: It's really a lovely chandelier a mixture of contemporary and traditional designs , brings in an elegance to any space. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: uchenna onubogu

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Casual enough for an open kitchen/dining room area, yet still classy and elegant. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rich look but a fraction of the cost of similar looking fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Estes

customer_reviews.title: Defective drum shade
customer_reviews.text: Hung this lamp less than a year ago, the drum shade has already separated....see photo. Love the chandelier but feel quality is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: IFG

customer_reviews.title: The quality was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The frame was bent . The quality was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light that looks great! We have vaulted ceilings so we had to rewire. Took some effort to get it all apart and fine the right thickness wire to complete the job, but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Missing shade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chandelier in February and I absolutely love it. However it was missing the frosted shade. I'm not sure who to contact about getting the missing piece?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light - it is bright enough for my dining room and the diffuser on the bottom keeps the bulbs from glaring in your eyes. It was a bit crooked with the metal part, but was able to straighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Ustad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality item - looks great and exactly as pictured. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katy V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light and so reasonably priced. I saw others similar to this priced at over $500.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Leach

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: We love this light fixture. After putting it up in our kitchen nook it looks amazing. The first time we ordered the fixture it arrived broken--3 of the 4 spokes at the top were broken and we had to return it. The second one we ordered also arrived broken, but only with 1 spoke broken. We did not feel like returning it again and possibly purchasing a 3rd broken item so we just installed the (slightly broken) fixture. It looks great in the house and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kland54

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse deal gone bad, looks great but the item is damage unsuable.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but end up returning due to damage (see photo). I blame myself for buying it from warehouse deal.
customer_reviews.author: Microally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chandelier and well-made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Boles

customer_reviews.title: larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: very nice light but larger than expected. if I had a bigger room I would have definitely kept it. it is very different then most lights.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Kommes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our dining room. It provides just the right light
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The smaller one is too small for over my kitchen table...yes, bought that one also, and this one is way too big...something in the middle would have worked better, but waiting for my electrician, I've now lost my window to return either of them
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic999

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful light fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light fixture. It was easily installed by this novice. The first one I ordered had a broken spoke on top, but the replacement fixture was fine. I think it is pretty fragile, but once it is installed it should be fine. I am using it with 3 Great Value LED 40 watt equivalent dimmable bulbs and it looks very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Sinte

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It's so beautiful and casts beautiful light. At first I thought it was too big, but it brings a sophisticated air to the room.
customer_reviews.author: MargoH

customer_reviews.title: Lovely light
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in perfect condition and installed easily. Gives off plenty of light (with only 2 bulbs) in my pantry / laundry room. Very happy with this fixture.
customer_reviews.author: NoCo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this lighting fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love this lighting fixture. 6 light bulbs fit inside, so it brightened up the room quite a bit. It is also very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous. It looks so modern but feminine and rustic at the same time. Very unique.
customer_reviews.author: Val's Furniture Assembly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition over our kitchen table. Provides wonderful light to our area.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Good looking chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Very pretty. Received compliments. From what I can tell it's well made. Great value. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Really Updated our Kitchen Dining Area
customer_reviews.text: This light is really, really nice. The price is half of what you would pay in a Lighting Store for something of this quality. It arrived in perfect shape and was quick to install.
customer_reviews.author: ScarletGray

product_meta.title: Canarm ICH320A03ORB20 Monica 3-Light Chandelier, 20.5" x 20.5" x 17.5", Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description: CANARM Style Monica ICH320A03ORB20 3 Bulb Chandelier - Adds style and warmth with its unique design and oil rubbed bronze finish with white shade and frosted glass diffuser. Uses 3 100W A bulbs (not included). Canarm has a long and successful history of supplying lighting and ceiling fans. They work diligently to create a comprehensive selection of styles and designs as well as maintaining high standards of product quality and value.
feature_bullets: Monica 3 Bulb Chandelier adds style and warmth with its unique design and oil rubbed bronze finish with white shade and frosted glass diffuser
Oil rubbed bronze finish - Uses 3 100W A bulbs (not included)
Includes 5 foot chain with 6 foot cord
White shade and frosted glass diffuser

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
